author: IBM Technology
description: OpenAI's latest paper reveals why language models hallucinate and why simply making them more accurate won't fix it. Watch full episode to learn expert's take on this.
title: Why AI Models still hallucinate?​

author: IBM Technology
description:

title: LLM as a Judge: Scaling AI Evaluation Strategies
